author: Tom Carreras, AI Boost
title: Bitcoin Miner CleanSpark Hits 50 EH/s Hashrate Milestone
description: The firm has set its sights on 60 EH/s.
content:
CleanSpark (CLSK), a U.S.-based bitcoin 
 mining firm, said Tuesday that it reached 50 exahashes per second (EH/s) of operational hashrate a milestone that makes it one of the largest mining operati… [+1001 chars]
